title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 35 - Vital Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 35 - Vital Records

State Regulations
§ 35.1 - Searches and certifications without fees
§ 35.2 - Birth records; confidential information
§ 35.3 - Fetal death; confidential information
§ 35.4 - Death records; disclosure
§ 35.5 - Genealogical research; method of disclosure; searches
§ 35.6 - Adoption information registry
§ 35.8 - Birth and death certification; form and content
§ 35.15 - Wallet-size certification of birth; fee

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 35

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§4100.1[c], 4132.1, 4138- b--4138-d, 4141.1, 4173, 4174

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
